name: 蔣政諺
objective:
神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.
schedule:
1. 簡介 (Introduction to neural networks)
2. 決策理論圖形式別 (Decision-theoretic pattern recognition)
3. 感知器 (Perceptron)
4. 多層感知器 (Multilayer perceptron)
5. 輻射基地函數網路 (Radial basis function network, RBF)
6. 支持向量分類器 (Support vector machine, SVM)
7. 自我組織類神經網路 (Kohonen's self-organizaing neural network)
8. 主分量類神經網路 (Pricipal component neural network)
9. 霍普菲爾德神經網絡 (Hopfield neural network)
10. 蜂巢式類神經網路 (Cellular neural network)
11. 漢明類神經網路 (Hamming neural network)
12. 自適應共振理論網絡 (Adaptive resonance theory network, ART)
scorePolicy:
作業與說明 (Assignment and Report): 60%
期中考 (Midterm examination): 20%
期末報告 (Final report): 20%
materials:
[1] 黃國源，"類神經網路 Neural network," 全華 2015.
[2] Raschka, Sebastian, and Vahid Mirjalili. "Python machine learning: Machine learning and deep learning with Python, scikit-learn, and TensorFlow 2." Packt Publishing Ltd, 2019.
[3] Nielsen, Michael A. "Neural networks and deep learning." Vol. 25. San Francisco, CA, USA: Determination press, 2015.
